name: 何文章
objective:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.
schedule:
第 1 週 / 1st-Week: Ch-14 Fluids 流體

第 2 週 / 2nd-Week: Ch-14 Fluids 流體 + Ch-15 Oscillations 振盪

第 3 週 / 3rd-Week: Ch-15 Oscillations 振盪 + Ch-16 Waves-I  波 - I

第 4 週 / 4th-Week: Ch-16 Waves-I  波 - I + Ch-17 Waves-II  波 - II

第 5 週 / 5th-Week: Ch-21 Coulomb’s Law 庫倫定律 + Ch-22 Electric Fields 電 場

第 6 週 / 6th-Week: Ch-22 Electric Fields 電 場 + Ch-23 Gauss’s Law 高斯定理

第 7 週 / 7th-Week: Ch-23 Gauss’s Law 高斯定理 + Ch-24 Electric Potential 電位

第 8 週 / 8th-Week:Middle-term Examination (期中考)

第 9 週 / 9th-Week:Ch-25 Capacitance and Capacitor 電容與電容器 + Ch-26 Current and Resistance 電流與電阻

第 10 週 / 10th-Week: Ch-26 Current and Resistance 電流與電阻 + Ch-28 Magnetic Fields (B) 磁場

第 11 週 / 11th-Week: Ch-28 Magnetic Fields (B) 磁場 + Ch-29  Magnetic Fields due to Currents 電流所產生的磁場

第 12 週 / 12th-Week: Ch-29  Magnetic Fields due to Currents 電流所產生的磁場 + Ch-30 Induction and Inductance

第 13 週 / 13th-Week: Ch-30 Induction and Inductance + Ch-32 Maxwell’s Equations (麥克斯威方程式), Magnetism of Matter (物質的磁性)

第 14 週 / 14th-Week: Ch-32 Maxwell’s Equations (麥克斯威方程式), Magnetism of Matter (物質的磁性) + Ch-33 Electromagnetic Waves 電磁波

第 15 週 / 15th-Week: Ch-33 Electromagnetic Waves 電磁波 + Ch-34 Images 成像

第 16 週 / 16th-Week: Ch-34 Images 成像 + Ch-35 Interference 干涉

第 17 週 / 18th-Week:Ch-35 Interference 干涉 + Ch-36 Diffraction 繞射 + Ch-38 Photons and Matter Waves 光子與物質波

第 18 週 / 18th-Week:Final-term Examination (期末考)
